name: Sunrise: survival
detailed_description:
"Sunrise" - is an online first-person shooter. Your task is to survive in the hard conditions of a post-apocalyptic world. Explore new regions, unite with other players to survive with them and create their own rules of survival!

Features of the game:
- The project is developing constantly: administration always in touch with players;
- Customization of the character and his equipment;
- An opportunity to use different types of transport;
- The developed craft's system of weapon, ammunition, etc.;
- Danger expects you continually: monsters, anomalies, natural phenomena, and also other players;
- The game world isn't static: danger can overtake you even if you stay idle!
- An opportunity to interact actively with environment elements;
- Powerful political system: You can be a single, and can create the group and occupy the territory, having established on her own rules;
- Realistic simulation of an environment;
